crane.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a large tall machine used by builders for lifting heavy things
crane.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a tall water bird with very long legs
crane.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to look around or over something by stretching or leaning
crane.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He craned his neck above the crowd to get a better view.
The children craned forward to see what was happening.
crane.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a large tall machine that lifts things and moves them from one place to another, used especially on building sites and for unloading ships
